thread.title: A romantic stay in Montparnasse - Review
thread.title_full: A romantic stay in Montparnasse - Review of Hotel Chaplain Rive Gauche, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nando N
title: A romantic stay in Montparnasse - Review
text:
We never been to Parise before so when booked didn't realise the hotel was is such a central and posh area of the city.
We found the hotel by using trivago and we have been very lucky.
Polite and very kind staff, suggestive atmosphere, a petit gem indeed.
We had breakfast that was delicious with both french and European selections.
Highly recommended if you want to stay on a budget but also book a perfect location to enjoy this chic city.
Anna, one of the members of the stadd have been also very helpful providing us all the info we asked during the check in. Great job!
